Force using eFuse configuration of VDD_SPI
Select RTC WDT time out threshold
SPI boot encrypt decrypt enable. odd number 1 enable. even number 1 disable

Enable revoke third secure boot key
Enable selection between usb_to_jtag or pad_to_jtag through gpio10
Select internal/external PHY for USB OTG and usb_serial_jtag
Flash wait time after power up. (unit is ms). When value is 15. the time is 30 ms

Configures the ECC mode for SPI flash. 0:16-byte to 18-byte mode. 1:16-byte to 17-byte mode
b00:force print. b01:control by GPIO46 - low level print. b10:control by GPIO46 - high level print. b11:force disable print.

Connected Flash interface type. 0: 4 data line. 1: 8 data line
